import { Modal } from 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min' import React from 'react' const CheckoutPopup=({show, handleClose, cartItems, totalPrice, handleCheckout})=> { return (
Checkout
{cartItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

Quantity: {item.quantity}

Price: ${item.price * item.quantity}

))}
Total: ${totalPrice}
) } export default CheckoutPopup
